text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-dexlansoprazole
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-esomeprazole
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-lansoprazole
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-omeprazole
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-pantoprazole
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-rabeprazole

name: Valueset_PPIS
title: Proton Pump Inhibitor Drug Value Set
description: ValueSet of ValueSets containing drug identifiers for each member in the     Established Pharmacologic Class (EPC) Proton Pump Inhibitor drug class (id: N0000175525).     Member by RxNorm: getRelatedByType (BN,BPCK,GPCK,IN,MIN,PIN,SBD,SBDC,SBDF,SBDG,SCD,SCDC,SCDF,SCDG)
purpose: Proton Pump Inhibitor drug class terminology for PDDI CDS FHIR resources
